key_risks: Securities class action lawsuits alleging securities fraud
Regulatory and compliance risks due to FDA and other approvals
Supply chain vulnerabilities from reliance on third-party suppliers
Competitive pressures from larger players in the orthopedic market
Litigation risks including product liability and intellectual property disputes
controversies: Multiple class action lawsuits for alleged securities fraud
Accounting irregularities and misleading financial disclosures
Internal control weaknesses identified in August 2024
social_issues: Significant stock price declines and investor losses
governance_issues: Failure to disclose material information leading to inflated stock prices
